text: Zbigniew Jacek Namysłowski (9 September 1939 – 7 February 2022) was a Polish jazz alto saxophonist, flautist, cellist, trombonist, pianist and composer. He was born in Warsaw, Poland. He worked on the Krzysztof Komeda album Astigmatic recorded in 1965. Namysłowski died on 7 February 2022 in Warsaw at the age of 82.Zbigniew Namysłowski nie żyje. Legendarny jazzman miał 82 lata. title: Zbigniew Namysłowski
